name: ORCID EU Labs
body:
## ORCID EU Labs projects


### Datacite/ORCID search & claim tool

Tool for searching for works in the DataCite metadata catalogue and adding them to an ORCID profile. Based on the code for [CrossRef Metadata Search](http://search.crossref.org).

**Status**: in production at http://datacite.labs.orcid-eu.org

**Code:** https://github.com/ORCID-EU-Labs/cr-search



### ISNI2ORCID 

Tool for searching the [ISNI registry](http://isni.org) by name and adding one or more
ISNIs to ORCID profile as as external identifiers.

**Status:** early development, expected release for beta testing early Nov 

**Code:** https://github.com/gthorisson/isni2orcid


***

All current Labs projects are being undertaken as part of the [ODIN project - ORCID and DataCite Interoperability Network](http://odin-project.eu).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
